title: Life Time acquires Sea Otter Classic, growing their event empire
content:
After 30 years in the running, the Sea Otter Classic is getting a change of ownership. Life Time announced today that the lifestyle brand has acquired the long-standing cycling event. The Monterey, California-based Sea Otter Classic holds the distinction of being North America’s largest consumer cycling event. The event joins Life Time’s portfolio, which includes […]

The post Life Time acquires Sea Otter Classic, growing their event empire appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristen Arendt
